thread.title: 'Hard to replace': UM's Ojemudia lost for season
thread.title_full: 'Hard to replace': UM's Ojemudia lost for season

author: detroitnews.com
title: 'Hard to replace': UM's Ojemudia lost for season
text:
Mario Ojemudia is helped off the field Saturday at Maryland. (Photo: David Guralnick, Detroit News) 
2 CONNECT 7 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Ann Arbor â€“ Michigan starting buck linebacker Mario Ojemudia will miss the rest of the season because of an Achilles tendon injury, coach Jim Harbaugh confirmed on Monday at his weekly news conference.
Ojemudia suffered the injury in the second half of the Maryland game Saturday.
Royce Jenkins-Stone is now listed as the starter on the most recent depth chart with Lawrence Marshall as the backup.
"It's hard to replace a guy like Mario, obviously the way he plays, how he gets his job done, but the greatest thing about football, you've got somebody working just as hard, pushing right behind you trying to take your spot and makes you better," linebacker and captain Joe Bolden said Monday. "I think we'll have somebody who will get in there and get the job done."
DETROIT NEWS
MSU at UM game will start at 3:30 p.m.
